name: clock -MOE-Droid-
summary:
"Roid-chan" clock is arranged on everyone's home screen.
It is a clock widget application program of character "Roid-chan" of 'MOE-Droid'(Japanese Moe Culture).
"Roid-chan" clock is arranged on everyone's home screen.
-confirming the operation- Xperia and Desire
info:
• 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: moedroid.jp

  • 售价: free
